inverse.$description: Inverse contrast color to use on this surface in dark or inverted contexts.

default.$description: Strokes for controls, inputs, and dividers in the role context; pick weight by emphasis.

on-surface.$description: Slightly darker stroke for slightly darker surfaces to maintain contrast.

inverse.$description: Stroke color for elements on inverted or dark surfaces.

soft.$description: Elevation shadow for subtle depth (cards, small surfaces).

medium.$description: Elevation shadow for medium depth (panels, popovers).

intense.$description: Strong elevation shadow for overlays and modals (combine with blur for backdrops).

soft.$description: Subtle outer glow for emphasis or luminous accents.

medium.$description: Moderate outer glow for highlighted states or featured elements.

intense.$description: Strong outer glow for standout emphasis and special effects.

soft.$description: Soft light tint for highlights or gently elevated surfaces.

medium.$description: Medium light tint for pronounced highlights.

intense.$description: Intense light tint for dramatic highlights or illuminated accents.

default.$description: Solid fill for primary actions and links (buttons, CTAs, prominent interactive elements).

hover.$description: Hover state for primary actions and links; slightly stronger to increase affordance.

pressed.$description: Pressed/active state for primary actions and links; strongest for tactile feedback.

default.$description: Low-emphasis background for actions and link containers using a transparent role color on light surfaces.

hover.$description: Hover state for toned actions/links; slightly stronger while remaining subtle.

pressed.$description: Pressed state for toned actions/links; stronger for clear interaction feedback.

default.$description: Fixed low-contrast fill for de-emphasized actions on busy imagery or complex surfaces.

hover.$description: Hover state for fixed fill; slightly stronger to improve affordance.

pressed.$description: Pressed state for fixed fill; stronger for tactile feedback.

default.$description: Ghost action background that preserves the underlying surface (links, tertiary buttons).

hover.$description: Ghost action hover state; adds a subtle tint to signal interactivity.

pressed.$description: Ghost action pressed state; slightly stronger tint for feedback.

default.$description: Text and icon color for actions and links in the role context.

on-surface.$description: Slightly darker action/link content for slightly darker surfaces to maintain contrast.

inverse.$description: Action/link content on inverted or dark surfaces.

weak.$description: Subtle border for low-emphasis actions, lightweight inputs, and quiet containers.

heavy.$description: Standard border for actions, inputs, and general UI boundaries.

heavier.$description: High-contrast border for selected, active, or critical emphasis.

inverse.$description: Inverse contrast color to use on this surface in dark or inverted contexts.

soft.$description: Elevation shadow for subtle depth (cards, small surfaces).

medium.$description: Elevation shadow for medium depth (panels, popovers).

intense.$description: Strong elevation shadow for overlays and modals (combine with blur for backdrops).

soft.$description: Subtle outer glow for emphasis or luminous accents.

medium.$description: Moderate outer glow for highlighted states or featured elements.

intense.$description: Strong outer glow for standout emphasis and special effects.

soft.$description: Soft light tint for highlights or gently elevated surfaces.

medium.$description: Medium light tint for pronounced highlights.

intense.$description: Intense light tint for dramatic highlights or illuminated accents.

default.$description: Solid fill for primary actions and links (buttons, CTAs, prominent interactive elements).

hover.$description: Hover state for primary actions and links; slightly stronger to increase affordance.

pressed.$description: Pressed/active state for primary actions and links; strongest for tactile feedback.

default.$description: Low-emphasis background for actions and link containers using a transparent role color on light surfaces.

hover.$description: Hover state for toned actions/links; slightly stronger while remaining subtle.

pressed.$description: Pressed state for toned actions/links; stronger for clear interaction feedback.

default.$description: Fixed low-contrast fill for de-emphasized actions on busy imagery or complex surfaces.

hover.$description: Hover state for fixed fill; slightly stronger to improve affordance.

pressed.$description: Pressed state for fixed fill; stronger for tactile feedback.

default.$description: Ghost action background that preserves the underlying surface (links, tertiary buttons).

hover.$description: Ghost action hover state; adds a subtle tint to signal interactivity.

pressed.$description: Ghost action pressed state; slightly stronger tint for feedback.

default.$description: Text and icon color for actions and links in the role context.

on-surface.$description: Slightly darker action/link content for slightly darker surfaces to maintain contrast.

inverse.$description: Action/link content on inverted or dark surfaces.

weak.$description: Subtle border for low-emphasis actions, lightweight inputs, and quiet containers.

heavy.$description: Standard border for actions, inputs, and general UI boundaries.

heavier.$description: High-contrast border for selected, active, or critical emphasis.

default.$description: Background surface at subtle for containers, sections, and app panels in the role family.

inverse.$description: Inverse contrast color to use on this surface in dark or inverted contexts.
